login.invalidCredentials: We can't find an account for that email & password combination. Please try again or reset your password.
login.deactivatedUser: Your account is disabled. Please contact support@revature.com
login.lockedUser: Due to some security reason this accout has been locked for 15 minutes

dashboard.welcomeMessageAfterActivation: RevaturePro is an online platform that provides no-risk pathways to advance career options and increase earnings. You’ve taken the first step in this process by signing up. Your next step is to browse our projects and enroll in the one that suits your career goals and likes best.
dashboard.welcomeMessageBeforeActivation: Thanks for signing up. We’ve just sent you an email with a link and instructions to activate your RevaturePro account. You’ll need to complete this step before you can access many of the features of this platform.

profile.profileNameExistsErrorMessage: Profile name is already taken. Try another.
